Text:
ok I downloaded this, is this the actual game as all I got was a rar file?

After unrar ing it all I get is a PKG file. Sorry but please help?
if "all you get" is a PKG file, then put this file in a flash drive/memory card then go to your folder "install PKG" click on the PKG file and install it! thats it!
How to Transfer PS3 Games from Your Desktop to Your PS3       please show me how step by step :'(

you need a PS3 running 3.55 CFW (custom firmware).  If you dont have this then I am not sure it will load onto the PS3.  Give it a try any way.  
Uncompress the rar file using your computer.  Save the .pkg file onto a USB stick (memory stick)
Insert the USB stick into your PS3
Go to game menu (on the PS3 home screen)
Scroll up and select "load package files"
Press x and it should download the file from the USB stick to your PS3.
Then in the game menu you should see the Joe Danger application and you can simply select it to open the game.

You're welcome :ì§¸) 
Hope you got it working?  It's an excellent game
